title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Management Strategy: Strategies for Enhancing Interaction through Digital Device Utilization in Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can implement three or more interaction-enhancing strategies when using digital devices in online/face-to-face learning environments
Learners can demonstrate through project deliverables how to design digital device usage regulations aligned with educational objectives

Learners observe three peers’ digital device usage (efficiency, security compliance, etiquette) over two weeks, provide feedback via a predefined 4-item 5-point rubric, and achieve an average ≥4/5 in peer-rated feedback usefulness.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
